problem_statement: Build a small, reliable table UI in a single HTML file using only vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The component must let users browse an in-memory dataset, filter it by search, sort it by column, and edit rows inline with save/cancel support. The UI must manage state predictably so that searching and sorting don't corrupt the underlying data, edits can be safely saved or reverted, and invalid edits show clear feedback without breaking the table. The component must also be usable with both mouse and keyboard.
FAIL_TO_PASS: Initial Render > should render the table with all rows
Initial Render > should display correct column headers
Initial Render > should have Edit button for each row
Search Functionality > should filter rows by name
Search Functionality > should filter rows by email
Search Functionality > should filter rows by status
Search Functionality > should filter rows by ID
Search Functionality > should show no results message when no matches
Search Functionality > should be case-insensitive
Search Functionality > should not modify underlying data after search
Search Functionality > search should preserve original data integrity
Sort Functionality > should sort by ID ascending when clicked
Sort Functionality > should sort by ID descending on second click
Sort Functionality > should sort by name ascending
Sort Functionality > should sort by name descending
Sort Functionality > should show ascending sort indicator
Sort Functionality > should show descending sort indicator
Sort Functionality > should not modify underlying data after sorting
Sort Functionality > should maintain sort when combined with search
Inline Edit Functionality > should enter edit mode when Edit button clicked
Inline Edit Functionality > should show Save and Cancel buttons in edit mode
Inline Edit Functionality > should disable other Edit buttons when editing
Inline Edit Functionality > should highlight editing row
Inline Edit Functionality > should save changes when Save clicked
Inline Edit Functionality > should update underlying data on save
Inline Edit Functionality > should revert changes when Cancel clicked
Inline Edit Functionality > should not modify data when Cancel clicked
Inline Edit Functionality > should exit edit mode after save
Inline Edit Functionality > should exit edit mode after cancel
Inline Edit Functionality > should re-enable Edit buttons after cancel
Validation > should show error when name is empty
Validation > should mark invalid input field
Validation > should not save when validation fails
Validation > should remain in edit mode when validation fails
Validation > should clear error when user types valid input
Validation > should validate status field
Validation > should show error for whitespace-only name
Keyboard Accessibility > should cancel edit with Escape key
Keyboard Accessibility > should save edit with Enter key in input
Keyboard Accessibility > should sort column with Enter key on header
Keyboard Accessibility > should sort column with Space key on header
Keyboard Accessibility > should focus first input when entering edit mode
Keyboard Accessibility > search input should be accessible
Keyboard Accessibility > column headers should have tabindex for keyboard navigation
State Management > should cancel edit when searching
State Management > should maintain edited data after sorting
State Management > should maintain edited data after searching
State Management > ID field should not be editable
